Headline: 95th-bound Red Line Delays
ShortDescription: 95th-bound Red Line trains are running w/residual delays following earlier police activity at 63rd. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
95th-bound Red Line trains are running w/residual delays following earlier police activity at 63rd.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #91 Austin Temporary Northbound Reroute near Roosevelt/Mason
ShortDescription: Northbound 91 Austin buses are temp. rerouted via Austin, Filmore, Mayfield, Roosevelt and Austin due to police activity near Roosevelt/Mason.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How does this affect my trip?

Northbound #91 Austin buses are temporarily rerouted via Austin, Filmore, Mayfield, Roosevelt, then resume their normal route on Austin due to police activity near Roosevelt/Mason.

Southbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
